com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report

Class ApplicationReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report.Report
      • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report.ApplicationReport

  • public class ApplicationReport
extends Report
    This provides a report of the actions which will be taken by the deployment utility given all of the information whih has been passed in.
